title: Ranked Team names (can they still be taken?)
body:
During the Pre-Season my friends and I created a raked team, and we were lucky enough to score a really cool name that we really wanted.

but we couldn't play enough games to get out of our promos (because its hard to organise 5 people all to be free at once) and the team is now inactive. but my concern is that now we can no longer play as the team (because ranked doesn't allow teams anymore) but the 'create a ranked team' button is still available. which means we cant make our team 'active' again by playing it. But other people can still create a team and take our name (and theres nothing we can do to stop it)

Is there some way we can keep our team name until teams become playable again later on?
